short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper tool to check memos in Mercury and create equialent tasks in EZlynx

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is a helper tool for the internal employees of the company. The tool automates one of the manual step in team's daily routine: Checking newly arrived memos on Mercury insurance portal and create equivalent tasks on EZlynx portal.

How to use:
1. Go to Mercury Insurance Portal and login
2. Go to EZlynx portal and login
3. Click the extension icon on the top right corner of Chrome browser
4. Extension will pull yesterday's memos from Mercury portal and create equivalent tasks in EZlynx portal
5. All newly created tasks are automatically assigned to currently logged in user of EZlynx

The extension does not store any data fetched from Mercury portal or EZlynx portal.
